amendment.description: To direct the Secretary of the Interior to lease certain public lands in Wyoming.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1714 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1714 proposed by Senator Reid. (consideration: CR S11539-11544; text: CR S11541-11542) To direct the Secretary of the Interior to lease certain public lands in Wyoming.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1714 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1714 proposed by Senator Reid.
